teamCompositionRules.totalActivePlayers: The team must have 11 active players
teamCompositionRules.totalLeftBacks: Must at least one left back or wing back, not both.
teamCompositionRules.totalRightBacks: Must at least one right back or wing back, not both.
teamCompositionRules.totalAllCenterMidfielders: Must have at least one midfielder
teamCompositionRules.totalDefensiveOffensiveMidfielders: Must have no more that one defensive or offensive midfielder
teamCompositionRules.totalCenterMidfielders: Must not have more that 3 center midfielders
teamCompositionRules.totalCenterBacks: Must have between 1 and 3 center backs
teamCompositionRules.totalLeftMidfielders: Must at least one left midfielder or winger, not both.
teamCompositionRules.totalRightMidfielders: Must at least one left midfielder or winger, not both.
teamCompositionRules.totalStrikers: Must have one ore none strikers
